EmailTemplate.name: 18-CSP-IA DemandGen Cont.-Email-Email | IA DG Con-T00205.T00205 Email3b_Bandwidt
EmailTemplate.subject: Bandwidth forecasting for wise network investments
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Bandwidth modeling tool Get valuable insight into current traffic and forecast future bandwidth demand To make the right decisions about your network investments, you need the right insight.
Nokia’s exclusive bandwidth modeling tool lets you simulate peak and sustained throughputs for single households or aggregated areas. Use statistical data for your region or vary the devices and video consumption patterns and instantly see the impact on network capacity. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
